text: Kerry Jayne Elizabeth Katona (born 6 September 1980 in Warrington, Cheshire, England) is an English television presenter, magazine columnist, actress and former pop singer with girl group Atomic Kitten. She was a contestant on the sixth series of Dancing on Ice in 2011. She finished in second place in the 2011 UK series of Celebrity Big Brother. In 2006, Katona was diagnosed with bipolar disorder.Katona condemns 'rude' Schofield == References == == Other websites == * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Cheshire Category:Big Brother contestants Category:Dancing on Ice participants Category:English movie actors Category:English pop singers Category:English television actors Category:Musicians from Cheshire Category:People from Warrington Category:People with bipolar disorder Category:Reality television participants Category:Television personalities from Cheshire
title: Kerry Katona
